评论详情: I’m so happy with this comfy suit that I’m going to order the teal color. The black one arrived yesterday and I wore it today. I’m 5’ 6” and 220 pounds. I usually have to wear XXL because of my big boobs. But I looked at the size chart and opted to go with the XL. The suit fits perfectly. Even the length is perfect. I like the polished look of this sweatsuit. The material seems high quality and my dog’s white fur brushes right off,

This is a beautiful set. The color was right on with the pics. It’s so comfy and warm. The only thing is it runs large. I am 5’3” and 120lbs and even the xs is a little big but also could just be made to be baggy.

Unless you live in a hot climate you need this one. It’s perfect material for fall or early winter. The material is light enough to put a layer underneath or to wear on its own. It is not a cotton jogger set. The material is a little more upscale making it look more polished. I think it can be worn with cute boots, sneakers or flats. The length & fit is perfect. I bought 2 colors in size L and both are cut the same. Pants are wide enough to be comfortable. The waist band is wide & the drawstrings are wide with finished ends & pants have deep pockets. The top has color coordinating zippers & looks boxy but when you put it on it’s sits just below the waist & lays nicely over the pants. The sleeves are a bit long on me but it’s still stylish. I say get a couple. You can’t go wrong for the price.

This is more of a crimson then bright red, which I personally like. Soft, silky material will be heavy enough for warmth and comfort without being too bulky. I sleep hot, so anxious to see if I can tolerate them through an entire night but definitely satisfied with appearance and value for the $$. I’m 5’1” and these are not ridiculously long. I can make it work without hemming them. I recommend!

I bought this to travel to and from Europe.  I loved the fabric, weight and loose fit of the pants.  Not too hot and not too cold.  I'm disappointed in the wear the fabric is showing after only wearing it 4 times.  I guess you would call it pilling.

评论概述: So comfortable, look nice. great for travel
评论详情: I love this cute sweat suit.  I wore this on a recent trip to Hawaii and it was perfect for travel.  I also wear when working from home or running errands around town.
The fit and quality is beautiful.  I order an  XS and the length is perfect.  The color Kangaroo Green is great.

评论概述: Cute but runs a little big
评论详情: I usually wear a M (5’7” 148 lbs) but a small would have worked best. The material is soft and cozy LOVE that. The pants are a little thin in that if you have some dimples they show through slightly but overall very cute. Great lounge set and will keep you warm. The color is a very nice neutral tan. Really like the set! Buying in black next.

First I must say I purchased 4 sets of these, I wash them after each wear as i had surgery on my knee and is in therapy. They wash well,  they are comfortable,  materal is buttery, not too thick.  I tell others about the comfort of this set and the all had good reviews. I can't wait to travel in them. Buy you will not regret it. Sorry for the person who said it did not was well.

This is the best fit I have ever gotten from any suit, I got the length, got the fit, top to bottom, not tight, not to lose, perfect. I am 5:9 and bought a large, even though it was recommended that I buy xl, but that would have been definitely too big… so glad I followed my gut. Gonna get me more colors…thank you!!!! Hurry and get you one before it’s sold out. Now that I have purchased a second suit it can one inch shorter than 1st one.and 3 one 2 inches shorter than the 1st one.so I have come to the conclusion that this product is sewn by different people. So you may or may not get exactly what you want.

评论概述: Material is super soft and comfy
评论详情: I absolutely love this lounge suit, I bought one loved it so much and purchased 3 more in different colors.  1 am 5’5” and the length was perfect, I am180lbs and bought a medium.  I live in an hot climate yet it was comfortable to wear.  I endorse this 100%.
Bought this set for my mom for Christmas… let’s just say it was a hit! The thickness is perfect, soft to the touch, so comfortable! My sisters ended up purchasing the same outfit!

Super soft and comfy. I ordered XL which is my normal size. The pants are great maybe even a little big. The top runs a little small. For the way the pants fit the top isn’t the same. Debating whether to send back as I don’t think I’ll be comfortable in the top. Sleeves are a little in the short side and the sweatshirt is not super long. Probably ok for younger girls but I like mine a little longer.
Design is excellent. Cut of the pants makes this appear high end. I do wish they were a little thicker  though. Will need to wear leggings or tights underneath in the winter months.

These run very long, but true to size! They are great to hang around the house in and even travel in. Colors are fantastic. They are not very warm, but the material quality is good. They wash well but tend to show stains easy.
I love this outfit so much! Lightweight, soft and cozy. I only gave it four stars because it started to pill after only two washes.
Material is nice. Not too heavy but substantial enough to drape nicely. Sizing is your normal size. Perfect for casual wear or to travel in. Thumbs up!
Loved the quality and fit.  Wish they offered a tall option.  I would have loved another inch or two on the length.  I am 5'8".
Bought as a gift for my mom. She loved it. Comfy and true to size.
I love this outfit, the fit is great and the fabric feels great. It's perfect to just lounge around the house in. We'll definitely buy in more colors.
These are nice, comfortable and well made. And while the styling is similar to the Spanx brand the fabric is much different.

评论概述: Love this so much! So soft & comfortable!
评论详情: This is one thing I would order again. I may order another color. It’s so cozy, soft love the color can wear it around the house you can wear it outside. You will not be disappointed.
Not crazy about the color. Just OK for the price
I love these sets are very comfortable and fit well. I just wish I knew something to put on it when it stains. Any help?

So I am a medium top and large bottom. Very confused what size to order because you can only order one size for both. I ordered a large and crossed my fingers. The top is a little bit big, but not sloppy big. The color and cut of the top is awesome. The reason why I gave it four stars is because the fabric is so slick and smooth that it catches on everything. I wish the fabric was a little more snag resistant.
Super soft and comfortable. A little long
I love the weight and feel of the fabric.  Is rather warm in the cold  weather. I am planning to order another set in a different color. Very pleased!!

评论概述: Fit nicely, comfortable, soft to the touch
评论详情: Great for at-home wear and doing errands. Good for travel, car or plane. Just received it, so I don’t yet know how well it launders.  That is an important consideration for me.
While I do like this outfit, I was expecting a thicker fabric.  It IS very comfortable and flattering, though.  Seems to be made well with nice attention to details

评论概述: Very Comfortable and Complimentary Travel Outfit
评论详情: I love this casual travel set. It feels great, and it looks wonderful. I bought a medium, much too big for me, and I gave it to sister. She loves it. I am 5’4-1/2”, 125 lbs., and the small fits perfect. My sister is 5’8-1/2 and bigger boned, and the medium is a nice fit. We both get compliments on them.

I have 2 sets now in different colors. Super comfortable and soft. Not too thin, not too thick. Nice stretchy material. Cost less than the spanx set I was originally looking at. Pants have pockets, elastic waistband and a drawstring which is super handy if you are in between sizes. Will definitely buy more!

I brought at least 5 of these suits..they were mice colors interchangeable soft not too hot for the summer and not too cold for the winter..love the pattern of the collars nice size pockets if you don't want to carry a purse and zipper is nice and strong

I like the wide collar, very nice material, very soft. I’m 5’3” so they were too long and I had to have them hemmed. I thought it was a little pricey but liked them. The large is a little big I might have been able to wear a medium I weigh 145.
Shirt sent in XL and pants in XXL. disappointed because it is a present. Fabric nice.

This outfit is so soft and stylish.  I read the reviews about some having problems with pills after washing.  I washed mind before I wore it.  I made sure I put it inside out.  Came out great.  Size is true.  I’m 5’6 118 XS.
This is my Sunday at home outfit. Very nice fabric and fit

Love this outfit and others by the same seller.  Material makes it great for casual work in the classroom, traveling or weekend brunch.  Only issue at 5’3” the pants are too long and need hemmed. If you don’t mind to hem the pants its well worth getting a few sets
Comfortable, however elastic ban twisted.  Great fit. Will purchase again.
This tracksuit is very comfy and fits well except the length of the pants. They are too short for a tall person. I’m 5’10 and size large- I don’t want to size up because it fits great otherwise.
No wrinkles , soft material , washes well and no balling up .
I love this sweatsuit! Reasonably priced! And just as good quality as other expensive brand names!
Fits perfect! Amazing! I have one in every color

评论概述: XS in Khaki is perfect fit for 5'2"
评论详情: The length of the pants hits just at the top of the foot if you are 5'2" and are short waisted as I am. I would have liked them a bit longer.  I was curious about Kangaroo model and only realized after ordering that it has a pouch pocket in the top. I will order another color with this feature.  Also, after washing and drying on low, the wrinkles that were present after removing from the vacuum packaging had not budged. I was able to remove them completely by using my hand held steamer. Once the wrinkles were removed, they have not returned. Even after wearing.

评论概述: Excellent comfort and fit. Looks just like the Spanx version
评论详情: Super comfortable and easy to wear. I bought the medium though could have gotten the small. I like things a tad oversized so it was perfect.
Better quality than expected! Great Spanx color lock sweat dupe!

These are fantastic for travel. They are comfortable, stylish and wash well. I have 4 sets from this brand. The medium fits perfectly. For reference, I’m 5’4 and 140 pounds. The pants hit below the ankle and are perfect for sneakers. Highly recommend this set.

This lounge set is so comfy, both of my sister bought a set as well! It is pretty true to size. Im usually between a large and XL because I have broad shoulders and a large chest. Since this looked loose fitting, I went with a large and it was perfect! I've washed it once and put it in the dryer with no shrinkage or pilling so far. Just as soft as the day it was delivered.

Love this outfit. It is so soft and looks very nice. I'm  67 and a grandmother. I'm 5'6" 180 lbs. I could have used a smaller size but its ok . If you want comfortable this is quality. Made very well .
Beautiful. Looks exactly like the photo fits amazing. I would definitely recommend this 100% and I would buy it again. It feels amazing.

I rate this a 15/10. My best Amazon purchase in years! I feel effortlessly put together. It’s so comfortable, weight of fabric is perfect and buttery soft, and best of all, it’s very flattering. Very true to size. I want this in every color!

I don’t write many reviews, but this set is wonderful. I am 5’6 weight 138, this fits perfect.  I have a bad back and can’t wear tight clothes, this set is so comfortable, I actually ordered another….
These sets are comfortable but can be dressed up or down. Perfect for traveling because they don’t wrinkle.
So comfortable, perfect for travel! The material is thick, and has a shiny/slick feel to the fabric.
Fabric is very soft. I ordered another one!

评论概述: I love this comfortable soft outfit. My whole family loves them. But they run big.
评论详情: My whole family has these and we all love them. They are very very soft and comfortable. They do run big. I normally wear a medium but I wears small in these.

I purchased the olive green in M and  length is perfect. (I am 5”7.) I just received the black set and the pants are much shorter. I am going to reorder another black set hoping they are longer. I love the set otherwise.  It comes very wrinkled but ironing on the wrong side or placing in the dryer worked.
This is a Christmas gift, it is so soft!!!!

Although they are nice, they are very lightweight and more suitable for the fall, I like that the top has a pocket on each side and pockets on the pants.  I also ordered ANRABESS Women 2 Piece Sweatsuit and they are much heavier for winter months, and the material feels nicer like Spanx but at a much more reasonable price.
Fabric, style, construction are all very nice. It’s very roomy though and I really should have sized down.
So far everything looks great. I have not had the time to try the garment on

评论概述: Runs very large and extremely long
评论详情: The fabric is very nice. The color is nice. Both top and bottom run one size too big. I am 5’5” and the pants were five inches too long. Size down one and prepare to have these hemmed.
Love it so soft
This item is comfortable and warm
Purchased two sets of these for my mother-in-law. She loves the feel of them and they keep her nice and warm.
It’s warm and comfortable. Very well made and the material will last. It looks nice on and doesn’t wrinkle. So it would be great for traveling. Doesn’t stretch, the top has more room than the pants.
Wore this the first day of our cruise.  I was super comfortable!
This set is really comfortable and  super soft.  The only thing I would change is the shirt could be a bit longer.

Definitely feels like a higher end product. Size down if you are in between sizes as it dies run a little large.  The zipper top is a little awkward. It has no stays or anything in it, so it either looks like a floppy collar or a loose turtleneck depending on how you wear.

I am 5'4, based on other reviews I assumed that I needed S, but too big. The lower part is not too long, just big for my weight which is 116Ibs, The upper part is long and big but can be oversized if like. I will return it, but the material is very good quality, soft, and stretch :)
Very comfortable and as expected
I loved the sweatsuit! Fit great and very soft with quality material! I wear a size 10 and the M fit perfect!
Exactly as pictured on web. An easy outfit for lots of outings.
This is an amazing addition to my wardrobe.  I absolutely love the quality of the fabric, the color and the comfort.  This is my go to for casual dress.  What an awesome purchase! I love it!!😇
Gifting this set to my mom and think she will really like the color, fabric and style
Love the fabric. Will be ordering more in different colors
Soft fabric with just the right thickness. However, the pants were too short, and I am only 5’4”!! I ordered a small  top and bottom which fit perfect except for the length.
So soft and comfortable. Not a sweatsuit look at all. Very stylish to wear for many occasions. Great for traveling. I have this in two colors and will get another one or two.
it is very comfortable. It is very lightweight. It also looks classy and the material feels great. I washed it for the first time and it held up great and looks great.
This set is the most comfortable fitting set I have bought! I did size down one just for a more fitted fit and I’m glad I did! I’m purchasing now in other colors!
Great quality, beautiful color would buy again
I don't love this because I wish it to be more comfortable but for the price its a good set. I wish it was a little looser in style too because picture looks so comfy.
Great fit and not too heavy! Super comfortable with nice quality.
I love the fabric. I am 5'8" and 145 pounds so a solid size 8. The pants are about an inch shorter than I would like. They fit larger than the average M.

I love this set. The material is very soft and washes well with no pilling. The top has a nice stand up collar and a very substantial zipper. The bottoms fit very nicely. I got a size xsmall and it fit my petite frame so well. The pants are a perfect length. I am 116 lbs and 5’4”

评论概述: Comparable to the spanx air essentials!!
评论详情: This is one of the best sweatsuits/loungewear  sets that I’ve ever owned. I compared it to the Spanx air essential and I cannot imagine spending $250 for that set when this one was less than $50 and looks every bit as good. I wore it all over Europe —on planes, trains, automobiles and boats! So versatile!! And you don’t look like a schlub in your jammy pants —this is a very tailored set. I would get up and wear it to the continental breakfast in our hotels, and I looked totally pulled together!  It holds its shape, it washes and wears with no pilling, it soft, comfortable, and really good looking! the fabric has plenty of give- the elastic waist on the pants (with adjustable drawstrings and pockets ) makes it super comfy! The top with the long zipper and the kangaroo pouch/pocket- creates a good looking open collar or when zipped up-almost a cowl neck. it’s a great value and I want it in another color!! I absolutely love this set!!

I was surprised about the quality of the material, it's very soft and made to wear on cool days. I'm 5'4  I ordered a large. The pants are long and need to be hemmed. The top fits as expected. I can fit long johns or tights under the top and bottoms .
The collar is so big that it will smack you in the face on a windy day. I also wish the top had pockets.

These are amazing. I got it as a gift. I loved the feel when I put it on so I bought two sets for my friend who gave me that gift. She is ready to buy more too! I wear size 2x and some xL. I found 1x was perfect.

评论概述: Nice, but the pants are short
评论详情: It's a nice lounge outfit. The pants are borderline short. I'm sure after washing they will be.  122#,  5'7  long legs and long arms. I bought the small. The top fits fine. Fits similar to mamamia video below.
Loved the fit and the feel wears well. Great for the price. No smell I washed it and it came out of he dryer perfect. Everyone loved it. 😍
The material is soft. The pants are the right length and I can wear it around the house or out to the store. I love it so much I ordered more for myself and a couple for Christmas gifts.
This was a perfect fit and the material was so soft and comfortable to wear. This can also be dressed up or down. Loved it and received many compliments

I ordered this as a gift for my aunt and now I am going to order one for myself. This outfit is so flattering. I am tall, so ordering a size up for length. But really cute! The material is so soft, lightweight, yet warm. You will love it!
The fabric is very soft and comfortable. It washes very well. I’m 5’8” and the bottoms shrunk a little.

评论概述: Great quality for the price. Very flattering fit.
评论详情: Fabric is really soft and the quality seems very good.  Have gotten so many compliments already.  I’m short 5”2 and the length is perfect for me.  The sleeves are a bit long but not terrible so I’m not sure how it would work on a taller person.  I normally wear a size 10-12 and the large is roomy but not too big that it looks sloppy. I’m very happy with this purchase and would wear this out to run errands, etc.

This set is a nice travel or relax at home set. Love the color and the easy fit of the pants. Love the top and the neckline but I do wish the waist of the top was a little looser and not so fitted. Would be more comfortable and look better.

评论概述: Comfortable and material smooth to the touch!
评论详情: Shopping and air traveling for Christmas

Nice fabric quality and my usual medium fit well. However, I am a fan of the new wider leg pant, especially in athleisure wear, and these pants were a bit....matronly, style-wise. They were loose, but tapered slightly. This created, in my opinion, more of a "grandma' look as opposed to other styles I have bought on Amazon. I will return.
Love the weight of this. It is a comfortable fit and stylish. I bought the navy

Love love love this lounge set! Buttery soft, washes and dries quickly and can't beat the price! Perfect length for me (5'6") with short waist and legs so may be short for anyone taller but it works great for me! True to size.
